title: Does a Photo Show Rioter Snatching a ‘Podium’ in the US Capitol?
subtitle: We're not sure if the item made it out of the building, but the photograph is real.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A photograph shows a rioter holding a lectern (which some bystanders referred to as a podium) inside the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021.
